SamPy.astronomy.conversions.get_magAB_from_flambda¶

SamPy.astronomy.conversions.get_magAB_from_flambda(flambda, wlength)¶

Converts a mag_AB value at a wavelength to f_lambda.

Parameters:
  • flambda (float) – mag_AB value
  • wlength (float) – wavelength value [nm]
Returns:

the mag_AB value
Return type:

float
